snippet: A complex set of rules govern how much of a president's re-election campaign is run out of the White House. But those lines can be blurred.
abstract: A complex set of rules govern how much of a president's re-election campaign is run out of the White House. But those lines can be blurred.

headline.main: Two Invitations, One Official, One Political, With the Same Guest List
headline.print_headline: As Campaign Season Begins, Some Lines Blur
